          <title>
            <string language="en">Freezer temperature controller</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefriermaschinetemperatursteuereinheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contrôleur de température de congélateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Controlador de temperatura do freezer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regolatore di temperatura del congelatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελεγκτής θερμοκρασίας ψυκτήρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regulador de temperatura del congelador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three diagrams demonstrating the use of logic gates in electronic control systems. The freezer temperature controller makes use of a NOT gate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electronic control systems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">freezer temperature controller</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third von drei Diagrammen, die den Gebrauch von 
Logikgattern in den elektronisches Steuersystemen zeigen. Die 
Gefriermaschinetemperatursteuereinheit gebraucht ein NICHT Gatter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de trois diagrammes démontrant 
l'utilisation des portes de logique dans des systèmes de commande 
électronique. Le contrôleur de température de congélateur se
sert PAS d'une porte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de três diagramas que demonstram o uso de 
portas da lógica em sistemas de controle eletrônico. O 
controlador de temperatura do freezer emprega NÃO uma porta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di tre schemi che dimostrano l'uso dei 
cancelli di logica nei sistemi di controllo elettronici. Il 
regolatore di temperatura del congelatore usa NON un cancello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών διαγραμμάτων που καταδεικνύει τη χρήση 
των πυλών λογικής στα ηλεκτρονικά συστήματα ελέγχου. Ο 
ελεγκτής θερμοκρασίας ψυκτήρων χρησιμοποιεί μια ΟΧΙ πύλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de tres diagramas que demuestran el uso 
de las puertas de la lógica en sistemas de control electrónico. 
El regulador de temperatura del congelador hace uso NO una 
puerta.</string>
          </description>
